TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler(object sender, DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs)
public delegate void DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DefaultAuthenticationEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 的 DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托定义为事件类。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 你可以访问事件类通过指定一个名为子例程**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 后引发事件事件，用于确保属性的当前填充对象。The event is raised after the event and is used to ensure that the property of the current is populated with an object. 你可以使用属性对象提供给**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值属性期间提供**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，设置属性到不包含任何用户信息的对象。If you do not specify a value for the property of the supplied during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the sets the property of the to a object that contains no user information. **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**后引发事件事件和之前事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the event and before the event. 如果你有一个部分，其中取决于要拒绝或允许访问应用程序的用户名称，修改属性的当前可能会影响你的应用程序的行为。If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the property of the current can affect the behavior of your application. 请确保在设置的用户名称**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件被视为时在你配置中指定部分。Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the section in your configuration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件来测试是否属性的当前是`null`。The following code example uses the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to test whether the property of the current is `null`. 如果属性是`null`，样本集属性的当前到对象，其中的对象是与"默认值".If the property is `null`, the sample sets the property of the current to a object, where the of the object is a with a value of "default". > [!NOTE] > **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件之前，将引发事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised before the event. 因此，如果你设置属性的当前到自定义标识，它可能会影响你的应用程序的行为。As a result, if you set the property of the current to a custom identity, it can affect the behavior of your application. 例如，如果你使用类并且你在确保只有经过身份验证的用户才能访问到你的站点，通过使用部分中，并指定``，此示例将导致要被忽略的元素，如用户将具有名称、 其为"default"。For example, if you are using the class and you are ensuring that only authenticated users have access to your site, by using the section and specifying ``, this sample will cause the element to be ignored, as the user will have a name, which is "default". 作为替代，你将指定``以确保只有经过身份验证的用户才能访问你的站点。Instead you would specify `` to ensure that only authenticated users can access your site.
